participant_1.background:
I roll my dice, and imagine new worlds.
I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation.
i am allergic to shellfish.
I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
i work as a english teacher.

participant_2.background:
I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby.
i am a soccer mom.
i love art.
I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
My adoptive parents were amazed when I played twinkle twinkle little star with my armpit.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! What are you up to?
I'm working on a model right now. I'm really into D&D and Warhammer, so I spend a lot of time building models for those games.
That's really cool! I'm not much of a gamer, but I do love art. I'm a soccer mom, so I don't have much time for hobbies anymore, but I used to love painting and drawing.
That's awesome! I wish I could draw. I'm not very good at it, but I love to try.
It's not so hard, you just have to practice! I took a lot of art classes in high school, and I've always been pretty good at it.
I'm impressed! I guess I just need to find some time to take some lessons.
You should! It's really fun, and it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I will, thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! So, what kind of model are you working on?
I'm building a D&D character. I'm playing a half-elf druid, and I'm really excited to see how he turns out.
That sounds really cool! I've never played D&D before, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to get together with friends and have some fun.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd like it.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
